description: Detects suspicious uses of the SysInternals Procdump utility by using a special command line parameter in combination with the lsass.exe process. This way we're also able to catch cases in which the attacker has renamed the procdump executable. Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Unlikely, because no one should dump an lsass process memory
Another tool that uses the command line switches of Procdump
name: Suspicious Use of Procdump on LSASS
